RagdollPlayerWhenShot Mod

Version: 1.3.30.0
Creator: Fern Aerell

Required:
- Script Hook V by Alexander Blade
- .NET Framework â‰¥ 4.8
- Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2019 x64
- Script Hook V .NET

How To Install:
- Download the mod files.
- Place RagdollPlayerWhenShot.dll in the scripts folder in your GTA V directory.
- Launch the game and enjoy!

Features:
- Triggers a ragdoll effect on the player when shot.

Notes:
- Ensure that all required dependencies are installed for optimal performance.
- For support or feedback, please contact the creator.
